problems_addressed.specific_problem: Agents not recognizing their phone as a potential money maker

episode_summary: Kim Rittberg discusses the importance of using video content to build connection and credibility in real estate. She emphasizes the need for a mindset shift to view phones as tools for generating business. The episode provides actionable strategies for creating engaging video content and shares success stories from agents who have benefited from her video bootcamp.
